profile.saveError: Sese: Le mafai ona teu tulaga

profile.noPrivateKey: E leai se ki tumaoti i lenei masini e auina atu i fafo.
profile.setBackupPassword: Fa'atulaga se upu fa'aulu e fa'amalosi ai lau fa'aleoleo:

profile.exportFailed: Ua le manuia le auina atu o ki
profile.enterBackupPassword: Ulufale le upu fa'aulu mo lenei fa'aleoleo:
profile.importSuccess: Ua faaulufaleina le ki tumaoti i lenei masini.
profile.importFailed: Le mafai ona faaulufaleina le ki (upu fa'aulu sese po'o le faila ua faaleagaina).
profile.keysRotated: Ua faia se pea ki fou ma ua lafoina le ki lautele.
profile.rotateFailed: Le manuia le suia o ki.
profile.keyDisclaimer: E le tuua lava e le ki tumaoti lenei masini. Auina mai se kopi fa'apuipui i se upu fa'aulu e toe fa'afo'i ai i se isi masini.
profile.themeFreeNotice: O e i le Free—fa'aoga filifiliga Sun/Moon o lo'o i lalo. Fausaga sili atu mo i latou ua fa'afou.
profile.backupDesc: Fausia fa'aleoleo fa'amalosi i upu fa'aulu mo au ki, ma toe fa'afo'i i se isi masini e fa'atasi ai.
profile.privacyBlurEnabled: Pupuni fe'au i le taimi muamua
profile.privacyBlurOnUnfocus: Pupuni pe a le taula'i le app
profile.notifyOnCopy: Fa'ailoa mai pe a kopi e se isi la'u fe'au
profile.loadFailed: Le manuia le utaina o le talaaga
profile.unfollowFailed: Le manuia le le toe mulimuli
profile.followHint: O a latou tala o le a alia'e i lau feed Mulimuli pe a latou lomia mo Tagata Mulimuli (po'o Lautele).
profile.sectionCrashedTitle: Le mafai ona utaina le vaega
profile.sectionCrashedBody: Sa i ai se mea sese i lenei vaega.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Faaliliu telefoni ma fe'au fou i lau telefoni po'o imeli ua fa'amaonia. E mafai e telefoni/fe'au o lo'o alu ese ona fa'aali lau numera Chatforia.
profile.forwardSaveFailed: Le manuia le teuina o tulaga
profile.errSmsDest: Filifili se taunu'u itiiti (telefoni po'o imeli).
profile.errQuietHours: E tatau ona i le va o le 0 ma le 23 taimi filemu.

sidebar.errorLoading: Le manuia le utaina o talanoaga
sidebar.loginPrompt: Saini e fa'asa'o ai ou tulaga.

auth.headline: Fe'au saogalemu, fa'aliliu vave i gagana uma
auth.description: Fa'ailoina-i-itu uma, fa'aliliuga AI, fe'au mou atu, ma telefoni leo/vitio.

feature.privacy: Tuma'oti muamua. O ou fa'amaumauga, o lou pule.

auth.desktopTip: I le komepiuta? Su'e i lau telefoni e maua ai le app.

headlineAlt.main: O le fe'au saogalemu lea e

auth.subhead: Fe'au tuma'oti, fa'ailoina, ma fa'aliliu—vave lava.
auth.tip: E mafai ona e fa'aogaina Chatforia i so'o se masini — pe sii mai le app mo le aafiaga sili.
auth.scanHint: Su'e e sii mai le app po'o tatalaina i lau su'esu'ega.
auth.iosAria: Sii mai i le App Store

home.title: Autū
home.subheader: Lafo se fe'au e amata ai se talanoaga.

press.title: Tala Fa'asalalau
press.contact: Mo fesili a fa'asalalauga, tusi mai i le press@chatforia.com.
press.contactText: Mo fesili a fa'asalalauga, tusi mai i le press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: O Chatforia o se fe'au saogalemu ma le fa'aliliuga vave ma le E2E, ua fuafuaina e faigofie ma tuma'oti talanoaga i le lalolagi.
press.assetsText: Logo, ata-pue, ma ata o oloa (o le a soso'o mai).

careers.title: Galuega
careers.intro: O matou o se 'au itiiti o lo'o fausia se fe'au fa'avaomalo tuma'oti. Afai e te popole i le fa'ailoina, avanoa, ma le aafiaga manaia o le UX, matou te fia fa'alogo atu.
careers.openRoles: Nofoa avanoa: Inisinia (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Lagolago.
careers.apply: Fa'afefea ona talosaga: Imeli lau resume/so'otaga i le jobs@chatforia.com.

about.title: Fa'atatau i Chatforia
about.description: O Chatforia o se fe'au tele-gagana ma le E2E, fa'aliliuga vave, ma telefoni leo/vitio. O la matou sini: fesoasoani i tagata e feso'ota'i—saogalemu, tuma'oti, ma i gagana uma.

values.access: Avanoa mo tagata uma: Fa'aliliu otometi 100+ gagana.
values.control: Pulea: Fe'au mou atu & faitauga faitalia e filifiliga.

about.howDescription: E fa'ailoina fe'au i lau masini ae le'i alu ese. Fa'aliliuga, fa'aleoleo, ma fa'atasi masini ua mamanuina e fa'aitiitia le mea e mafai e matou auaunaga ona iloa.

advertise.title: Fa'asalalau i Chatforia
advertise.description: Aapa atu i tagata fa'aoga fe'au i ni nofoaga lelei ma le mamalu. O lo'o matou ofoina atu fu'a fa'aaliga, fa'amaopoopoga, ma promos a le fale. E le va'ai fa'asalalauga i latou Premium.

adsense.withPubId: O lo'o matou tautuaina fa'asalalauga e ala i le Google AdSense. Afai e te mana'o e taula'i mai e ala i Google Ads, fa'aoga le ID o le lomiga {{pubId}} ma talosaga mo nofoaga pulea i a matou iunite o lo'o i lalo. E avanoa fo'i fa'amaopoopoga tu'usa'o—fa'aoga le pepa.
adsense.noPubId: O lo'o matou tautuaina fa'asalalauga e ala i le Google AdSense. E avanoa fo'i fa'amaopoopoga tu'usa'o—fa'aoga le pepa o lo'o i lalo.

advertise.noPlacements: Leai ni nofoaga ua fa'atulaga. Fa'aopoopo i ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Tele taimi fa'aaogā ma nofo umi i le UI o talanoaga
why.brandSafe: Fa'atusa saogalemu mo fa'ailoga; fa'atapula'a taimi fa'aaliga ma le faaaloalo
why.sponsoredMoments: Taimi fa'amaopoopo (fa'ata'ita'iga, “Amata se Talanoaga” modal) e avanoa
why.deals: Fefa'ataua'iga tu'usa'o po'o e ala i AdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Fa'afetai! Ua aga'i mai lau fesili. O le a matou tali lata mai.
form.missingRequired: Fa'amolemole fa'atumu le igoa, imeli, ma le fe'au.
form.successToast: Fa'afetai! O le a matou feso'ota'i lata mai.
form.mailtoInfo: O lo'o tatalaina lau imeli e auina le fesili…
form.messageLabel: Ta'u mai e uiga i lau ta'amilosaga
form.messagePlaceholder: Taula'iga, aso, KPI, mea e te mana'o i ai…

legal.disclaimerStart: I lou tu'uina atu, o lo'o e ioe i la matou

upgrade.title: Fa'afou
upgrade.subtitle: Filifili le fuafuaga sa'o mo oe: aveese fa'asalalauga i le Plus, po'o maua foliga uma i le Premium.

scheduleBanner.title: O le a fa'ai'u lau lesitala
scheduleBanner.body: O le a e toe fo'i i le Free i le

features.save25: Sefe ~25% pe a fa'atusatusa i masina
features.sameFeatures: O foliga tutusa ma le Masina

gettingStarted.title: Amata
gettingStarted.subtitle: Fou i Chatforia? O lenei ta'iala vave e fa'aali mea tāua ina ia e amata i ni nai minute.

alert.text: O le a fa'alautele lenei ta'iala a'o matou fa'alauiloa foliga fou. Afai e misi se mea, fa'afesoota'i mai e ala i le

section2.title: 2) Amata fe'au
section2.item1: Fausia se DM po'o se Kulupu ma lafo le fe'au muamua.
section2.item2: Fa'aoga fa'aliliuga vave mo gagana e 100+.
section2.item3: Tofotofo fe'au mou atu ma faitauga i le Talaaga → Tuma'oti.

section3.title: 3) Alu atili
section3.item1Part2: itūlau (Plus = leai fa'asalalauga, Premium = foliga atoa).
section3.item2Part1: Feso'ota'i nisi masini ma seti fa'aleoleo fa'amalosi i

account.q: E fa'apefea ona ou faia po'o toe maua la'u tala?
account.a: Sii mai le app po'o fa'aoga le upega, oomi “Fausia tala”, fa'amaonia lau imeli/telefoni. Mo le toe maua, fa'aoga “Galo le upu fa'aulu”.

privacy.a: Ioe. Fe'au ma telefoni e E2E i le masani. Na'o oe ma le tagata e te lafo i ai e mafai ona faitau.

translate.a: Fa'aola “Fa'aliliu otometi” i Tulaga → Va'ai & Gagana. Matou te fa'aliliu i luga o le masini pe a mafai, a leai e ala i API puipuia ma fa'amatalaga fa'aitiiti.

contact.a: Tusi mai i support@chatforia.com. Fa'aopoopo ata-pue ma lau fa'aliliuga o le app.

contact.title: Fa'afeso'ota'i Matou
contact.successMsg: Fa'afetai—o le a tali mai la matou 'au i le imeli.
contact.errorSend: Le mafai ona auina. Fa'amolemole tusi i support@chatforia.com.

intro.body: O lenei Faiga Tuma'oti e fa'amatalaina pe fa'apefea e Chatforia (“matou”) ona aoina, fa'aoga, ma fa'asoa fa'amatalaga pe a e fa'aogaina a matou app ma auaunaga. Ua mamanuina Chatforia e fa'aitiitia le fa'amatalaga e mafai ona matou maua.

infoWeCollect.title: Fa'amatalaga matou te aoina
infoWeCollect.account: Fa'amatalaga o le tala (fa'ata'ita'iga, imeli/telefoni) e fai ai ma puipui ai lau tala.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Anotusi fa'ailoina (fe'au/telefoni) e E2E; e lē mafai ona matou faitau.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Fa'amaumauga o mea sese/usage e pei o logs, ituaiga masini, po'o fa'amaumauga laiti mo le fa'aleleia.

howWeUse.title: Le auala matou te fa'aogaina ai fa'amatalaga
howWeUse.provide: Tu'uina ma puipuia le auaunaga (fa'amaoniga, puipuiga fa'asese/abuse).

sharing.title: Fa'asoa
sharing.body: E le fa'atau e matou fa'amatalaga patino. E mafai ona matou fa'asoa fa'amatalaga laiti i pa'aga faigaluega (fa'ata'ita'iga, push, analytics) i lalo o feagaiga mautu.

rights.title: Au aia
rights.body: E fa'alagolago i lou itulagi (fa'ata'ita'iga, GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), e mafai ona e talosaga mo le ulufale, fa'asa'oga, tape, po'o le 'alofia o nisi fa'agaioiga. Fa'afesoota'i: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Teuina & Saogalemu
retention.body: Matou te teuina na'o le mea e mana'omia mo le fa'agaoioiga o le auaunaga ma fa'aogaina puipuiga masani o le alamanuia. E le mafai ona matou tatala le anotusi E2E.

children.title: Tamaiti
children.body: E le fa'atatau Chatforia i tamaiti i lalo o le 13 (po'o le manaoga a lau tulafono i le lotoifale).

changes.title: Suiga
changes.body: O le a matou tu'uina mai fa'afouga iinei ma toe suia le aso “Fa'afouina mulimuli”.

intro.body: I lou fa'aogaina o Chatforia o lo'o e ioe i nei Tulafono. Afai e te le ioe, aua le fa'aogaina le auaunaga.

accounts.title: Tala
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Tu'uina atu fa'amatalaga sa'o ma tausi puipuia au fa'amatalaga ulufale.
accounts.itemResponsibility: E te nafa ma gaioiga uma i lau tala.

acceptableUse.title: Fa'aaogāina talafeagai
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Aua le fa'aoga mea faasolitulafono, sauā, po'o soli aia; aua le spam po'o fa'aoga otometi.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: E mafai ona matou fa'amuta/taofia mo soliga.

yourContent.title: Lau anotusi
yourContent.body: E tumau ou aia i lau anotusi. E te tu'uina mai ia i matou aia tatau e mana'omia e fa'agaoioi ai le auaunaga (fa'ata'ita'iga, routing, teuina, fa'aliliuga).

disclaimer.title: Fa'amatalaga & noataga
disclaimer.body: E tu'uina le auaunaga “pei ona iai” e aunoa ma ni fa'amautinoaga. I le tapula'a maualuga a le tulafono, e le noatia Chatforia i ni fa'aleagaina tu'usa'o po'o taunuuga.

changes.title: Suiga
changes.body: E mafai ona matou fa'afou nei tulafono; o le fa'aauau fo'i o lona fa'aogaina pe a uma suiga o lona uiga ua e talia.

doNotSell.title: Aua le Fa'atau pe Fa'asoa La'u Fa'amatalaga Patino
doNotSell.body: E lē fa'atau e Chatforia fa'amatalaga patino. E mafai e tagatanu'u o Kalefonia ona tu'uina atu pea ni talosaga i lalo o le CPRA e ala i le ki o lo'o i lalo.

cookies.title: Tulaga Kuki
cookies.body: E fa'aoga e Chatforia ni kuki laiti (fa'ata'ita'iga, sauniga, saogalemu). E le fa'aogaina kuki fa'asalalauga a isi vaega. Pulea kuki i tulaga a lau su'esu'ega.

phoneNumberManager.unableToLoadStatus: Le mafai ona utaina le tulaga o le numera telefoni.
phoneNumberManager.noNumberAssigned: Leai se numera ua tofia. Filifili e ala i le area code e amata ai ona tusi fe'au.

startChatModal.title: Amata se talanoaga
startChatModal.nameUsernamePhoneEmail: Tusi igoa, username, telefoni, po'o imeli…
startChatModal.startWithSelected: Amata talanoaga ma i latou ua filifilia
startChatModal.searchByUsernameOrPhone: Su'e e ala i le username po'o le telefoni
startChatModal.searchPrompt: Tusi se username po'o le telefoni ma oomi Su'e.
startChatModal.pickAtLeastOne: Filifili se tasi pe sili atu.
startChatModal.saveContactsHint: O numera/imeli o le a avanoa pe a uma ona e teuina o ni feso'ota'iga.
startChatModal.failedBulkStart: Le manuia le amata talanoaga ma i latou na filifilia.

sounds.freeNotice: O e i le Free — o leo Premium o lo'o fa'aalia ae loka. Fa'afou e tatala uma.

premiumGuard.requiresPremium: E mana'omia se fuafuaga Premium mo lenei foliga.

aiSettings.title: Tulaga AI
aiSettings.controlIntro: Pulea fa'aliliuga, tali atamai, ma tali otometi a ForiaBot.
aiSettings.autoTranslateIncoming: Fa'aliliu otometi fe'au o lo'o ulufale mai
aiSettings.showOriginalAlongside: Fa'aali le ulua'i fa'atasi ma le fa'aliliuga
aiSettings.smartRepliesHint: Auina atu fe'au lata mai (ua fa'amama) i le AI e fautuaina ai tali vave.
aiSettings.maskProfanity: Natia upu le talafeagai i fautuaga AI
aiSettings.maskProfanityHint: Afai o lo'o ki, o fautuaga a le AI o le a natia ai upu fa'ailoga
aiSettings.enableAutoReply: Fa'aola tali otometi pe a ou pisi
aiSettings.saveFailed: Le manuia le teuina o tulaga AI
aiSettings.translateAll: Fa'aliliu fe'au uma o lo'o ulufale
aiSettings.modeAll: Fe'au uma o lo'o ulufale mai

accessibilitySettings.title: Avanoa & Lapata'iga
accessibilitySettings.accessibilityDesc: Filifiliga e faigofie ai Chatforia e aunoa ma le fa'alagolago i le leo.
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSize: Tele o le mata'itusi o le interface
accessibilitySettings.interfaceFontSizeHelp: E amata i le tele masani. Fa'atele pe afai e te mana'o i tusitusiga tetele.
accessibilitySettings.notificationsDesc:
Fa'ailo va'aia mo fe'au & telefoni
Fa'aali fa'amalama ma emo le ulutala ina ne'i misia se gaioiga.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNew:
Vibrate i fe'au fou (pe a lagolagoina)
Fa'aoso le gatete a le masini ma lapata'iga.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCall:
Susulu le lau i le vala'au ulufale mai
Emo pupula pe a tatagi le vala'au.
accessibilitySettings.captionFontSize: Tele o le mata'itusi o fa'amatalaga
accessibilitySettings.autoTranscribeVoiceNotes:
Fa'aliliu otometi fa'amatalaga leo
Fa'apipi'i se tusitusiga i leo o lo'o e maua.
accessibilitySettings.loadFailed: Le manuia le utaina o tulaga
accessibilitySettings.visualAlertsDesc: Fa'aali fa'amalama ma emo le ulutala ina ne'i misia gaioiga.
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewShort: Vibrate i fe'au fou (pe a lagolagoina)
accessibilitySettings.vibrateOnNewDesc: Fa'aoso le gatete a le masini ma lapata'iga.
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallShort: Susulu le lau i le vala'au ulufale mai
accessibilitySettings.flashOnCallDesc: Emo pupula pu'upu'u pe a tatagi le vala'au.

privacySection.ciphertextOnlyNote: Teu na'o le ciphertext i le server. Tape AI/Fa'aliliuga ma va'aiga fa'atonutonu.

linkedDevicesPanel.title: Masini Feso'ota'i
linkedDevicesPanel.noneFound: Leai ni masini feso'ota'i na maua.

peoplePage.searchPlaceholder: Su'e e ala i le igoa fa'aigoa, igoa, username, po'o le telefoni
peoplePage.quickStartDesc: Ni auala vave e fa'aauau ai.
peoplePage.searchByPhoneOrUsername: Su'e e ala i le telefoni / username
peoplePage.inviteDesc: Fa'asoa lau so'otaga valaaulia e amata ai loa talanoaga.
peoplePage.getTheAppDesc: Nofo fesoota'i i luga o le alu ma Chatforia mo iOS ma Android.
peoplePage.syncTip: Fautuaga: E tumau le fa'atasi o au fe'au i le upega ma le telefoni.

randomChat.title: Talanoaga Fa'afuase'i
randomChat.description: Feiloa'i ma se tagata fou loa. Matou te fa'afetaui ma tatalaina se potu talanoaga le tumau.
randomChat.noPartner: Leai se pa'aga i le taimi nei.
randomChat.saveGuard: Na'o talanoaga tagata-i-tagata e mafai ona teu
